channel.title: Operating System?
channel.description: :) :rolleyes: :| :confused: ;D How i need Help: i get error when i run client or servers. How i need you guys to help me: Please put in your operating system that you have in this post. Example : Windows Vista (64 bit) - 508 Server(Or what ever type of server you run) Why?: i want to know if it windows vista that is causing problems for running server. What Else?(508-562 Only): Please post "No Errors" if you didn't have get any error when you first ran a 508 source. (Non-Recovered- Meaning that nothing happen to your computer so you didn't have to use the program system recovery program to restore it to the day you got the computer in shipment. (System Recovery-Window Vista and UP) Hope you guys help me. This is like a Survey like Poll.

item.title: Operating System?
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:

Meaning that nothing happen to your computer so you didn’t have to use the program system recovery program to restore it to
the day you got the computer in shipment. (System Recovery-Window Vista and UP)
Hope you guys help me.
